ministry: Government of Tamil Nadu - Health Department
description: Cashless health insurance scheme for low-income families in Tamil Nadu providing coverage up to ₹5 lakh per family per year.
target_beneficiaries: Sri Lankan refugees with proof of citizenship

eligibility.income_limit: Annual family income ≤ ₹1,20,000 (≤ ₹72,000 in older records)
other_conditions: Must be resident of Tamil Nadu
Name must be listed on family ration card
Migrants from other states require migration certificate + 6 months TN residency
Excludes government servants, ESI beneficiaries, income tax payees

required_documents: Income certificate from Village Administrative Officer/Revenue Authorities
benefits: Cashless hospitalization at 800+ government and 900+ private empanelled hospitals
52 diagnostic procedures and 8 follow-up treatments included
Pre-existing conditions covered with no waiting period

steps: Obtain income certificate from VAO/Revenue Authorities
Visit authorized CMCHIS enrolment centre with documents
Submit documents to kiosk operator for verification
Provide biometric details (fingerprints, eye scan, photograph)
